EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Your Passenger Information Form is due in 24 hours
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
.
Dear {!Order_Communication_POE__c.ordexp_Purchaser_First_Name__c},
Our team recently emailed you to confirm your TripADeal purchase. This email included a link to your Passenger Information Form.
Please note that we require this form to be completed and returned within the next 24 hours to ensure your order is confirmed.
If we don't receive your completed Passenger Information Form, we will cancel your booking and issue you with a TripADeal credit voucher for the value of your purchase as per the booking terms. Please refer to our Terms and Conditions for further details.
Click the button below to be directed to your Passenger Information Form.
GO TO MY DEALS
If you have not already set a password, you can do so here.
We're here to help you. If you have any questions, please visit our Support Page. Or call us on 1300 861 736.
Regards, The TripADeal Team
.
